title: Grateful Dead Live at Merriweather Post Pavilion on 1984-06-26
source: Source from Doug Oade: Schoeps cmc441 > Sony TC-D5M > Sony PCM-601ESD > Wav; Mastering by Dave Usborne: Izotpoe RX Advanced Declick and Spectral Repair used manually to fix pops and digital artifacts. Editing done in Reaper V4.591/X64; Tracks cut in Audacity 2.0.5; Flac files created and SBE's fixed in Traders Little Helper
